thread.section_title: Munich Ski Shuttle Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von Munich Ski Shuttle | www.munich-ski-shuttle.com
thread.title: Hans-Petter
thread.title_full: Munich Ski Shuttle bewertet von Hans-Petter

author: Hans-Petter
title: Hans-Petter
text:
We were a group of 5 that made our way to and from Munich-Kitzbuhel. The driver was there waiting for us when we arrived, and picked us up on time for the return. Due to heavy traffic both drivers took us through alternative roads to get to the destination in time.
Very professional and comfortable! Recommended!
